location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to Government, to the Resident or Officer in Charge at Bushire

mods.abstract: Warden writes to acknowledge receipt of Bruce's letter of 21 October 1819, stating that the Honourable Governor in Council approves of Bruce's engagement of the services of a 'Burbon [Bourbon] French man' for the reasons stated.
